channel.title: bespoke model construction on Austin Herrick
channel.description: Recent content in bespoke model construction on Austin Herrick

item.title: Projects
item.description: See below to learn about my recent personal projects - Data Visualization and Dynamic Modeling # A Dynamic Model, Elo Approach to Magic Draft Analysis # Paper Text Github Repo In this project, I investigate the win rate anti-correlation generated by record-based matchmaking in a tournament setting, as opponent skill level reacts in real time to a competitor’s current performance. To do this, I constructed a dynamic model which simulates thousands of iterated Magic: The Gathering draft tournaments by matching players against each other based on current record.
